title: LeisureLink Team’s up with Vail Resorts for a Vacation Rental Distribution Technology Roadshow - Travelandtourworld.comTravelandtourworld.com
text:
LeisureLink Team’s up with Vail Resorts for a Vacation Rental Distribution Technology Roadshow
LeisureLink announced they will be partnering with Vail Resorts for the next stop on their eight city “Vacation Rental Distribution Technology Roadshow” tour. The next event takes place today, July 14th, 2015 at Legacy Lodge at Park City Mountain Resort.
The roadshow is designed to share the impact of distribution on the vacation rental industry, and the latest technologies to help suppliers streamline their businesses and grow their revenues. Vacation rental managers and owners in the area are invited to RSVP for a Happy Hour and schedule a 1-on-1 discussion with a LeisureLink Account Manager. Drinks and appetizers will be provided, and all attendees will have a chance to win the coveted Apple Watch.
“We kicked off the Tour in Breckenridge last month, and it was a huge success,” said Julian Castelli, CEO of LeisureLink. “The events offer an incredible opportunity for suppliers in the region to network with industry experts, peers, and to discover how our Smart Distribution Engine can help increase bookings. Our goal is to create a unique experience that brings the latest innovations practically to the attendee’s front door.”
With access to 80 million visitors per month, LeisureLink is the vacation rental distribution technology leader and the exclusive provider of lodging inventory for Vail Resorts Management central reservations program in Park City. Over 150,000 vacation properties currently rely on the user-friendly solutions to help them optimize revenue, drive more bookings and increase operational efficiency. The LeisureLink team will be in town July 13th through the 15th to meet with vacation rental suppliers about participating in the Park City Central Reservations program to increase reservations this season.
Other destinations on the LeisureLink tour include (click on links to RSVP):
Vail/Beaver Creek/Avon – July 29
Aspen/Snowmass – August 5
Mammoth Lakes – August 12
Jackson Hole/Teton – September 21
South Lake Tahoe – September 29
North Lake Tahoe/Truckee – September 30
About LeisureLink
Salt Lake City-based LeisureLink helps vacation property suppliers optimize the value of distribution. Suppliers can easily distribute their inventory to top online travel agencies like Expedia, Booking.com, VacationRoost, and Orbitz; all major global distribution system players; and the top travel tour operators. Suppliers can manage their distribution from one platform – optimizing rates, availability, specials, and even content changes. Suppliers are provided with specialty distribution consulting and expertise from Account Managers who understand travel distribution, and can maximize exposure. Finally, LeisureLink consolidates all accounting, payables and receivables with a single, reliable source of payment, providing order and clarity to the often complex accounting issues in the world of travel distribution. For more information, visit LeisureLink.com.
